00040 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 
00043 #ifndef PIZ_NEURAL_GAS_H
00044 #define PIZ_NEURAL_GAS_H
00045 
00046 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 
00049 #include "pizDataStructures.h"
00050 
00051 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 
00054 /**
00055  * \ingroup neuralGas  
00056  */
00057  
00058 typedef struct _PIZNeuralGasHead {
00059     double          error;                      /* Cumulative error of the node. */
00060     double          utility;                    /* Cumulative utility of the node. */
00061     PIZItemset128   arcs;                       /* Arcs (indexes as bit field). */
00062     }PIZNeuralGasHead;
00063 
00064 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 
00067 /**
00068  * \remark  Implemented with two synchronized pools (pre-allocated heads and pre-allocated vectors), 
00069  *          and a map to mark slots used. 
00070  * \ingroup neuralGas
00071  */
00072  
00073 typedef struct _PIZNeuralGas {
00074     PIZItemset128       map;                    /* In use (as bit field). */
00075     long                count;                  /* Number of learning iterations performed. */
00076     long                vectorSize;             /* Size of a node's vector. */
00077     long                mapSize;                /* Number of nodes in the neural gas. */
00078     long                maximumSize;            /* Maximum number of nodes in the neural gas. */
00079     long                lambda;                 /* New node rate. */
00080     double              epsilon1;               /* Move winner factor. */
00081     double              epsilon2;               /* Move neighbours factor. */
00082     double              alpha;                  /* Decrease generators error factor. */
00083     double              beta;                   /* Decrease global error factor. */
00084     double              kappa;                  /* Utility threshold. */
00085     double              *vectorStock;           /* Pool of vectors. */
00086     PIZNeuralGasHead    *headStock;             /* Pool of heads. */
00087     PIZBoundedStack     *ticketMachine;         /* Pool management. */
00088     } PIZNeuralGas;
00089 
00090 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 
00093 PIZ_START_C_LINKAGE
00094 
00095 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 
00098 /**
00099  * \brief   Create the neural gas.
00100  * \details The function accepts two arguments, the maximum size of the neural gas, and the size of the vectors.
00101  *          For the neural gas size, maximum is 128, default is 20.
00102  *          For the vectors, maximum is 256, default is 4.
00103  *          In case of failure the pointer is NULL.
00104  * \param   argc The number of arguments.
00105  * \param   argv A pointer to arguments.
00106  * \return  A pointer to the new neural gas.
00107  * \remark  The following shows how to create a neural gas.  
00108  * \code
00109  * long args[2] = {50, 8};
00110  *
00111  * PIZKohonenMap *map = pizKohonenMapNew (2, &args);
00112  * PIZKohonenMap *map = pizKohonenMapNew (0, NULL); // default values
00113  *
00114  * \endcode
00115  * \ingroup neuralGas
00116  */
00117 PIZNeuralGas *pizNeuralGasNew (long argc, long *argv);
00118 
00119 /**
00120  * \brief   Free the neural gas.
00121  * \details It is safe to pass NULL pointer. 
00122  * \param   x A Pointer.
00123  * \ingroup neuralGas
00124  */
00125 void pizNeuralGasFree (PIZNeuralGas *x);
00126 
00127 /**
00128  * \brief   Add values to the neural gas.
00129  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00130  * \param   argc The number of values.
00131  * \param   argv A pointer to the values.
00132  * \return  An error code.
00133  * \remark  The birth and death of nodes occurs according to lambda value (1 time out of lambda).
00134  *          Values provided are clipped [0, 127].
00135  * \ingroup neuralGas
00136  */
00137 PIZError pizNeuralGasAdd (PIZNeuralGas *x, long argc, long *argv);
00138 
00139 /**
00140  * \brief   Clear the neural gas.
00141  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00142  * \ingroup neuralGas
00143  */
00144 void pizNeuralGasClear (PIZNeuralGas *x);
00145 
00146 /**
00147  * \brief   Fill a given array with neural gas values.
00148  * \remark  A node is randomly drawn, and the array filled with values from the node's vector. 
00149  *          While the array is not full, process is iterated.
00150  * \param   argc Number of values to proceed.
00151  * \param   argv Pointer to the array to fill.
00152  * \return  An error code.
00153  * \ingroup neuralGas
00154  */
00155 PIZError pizNeuralGasProceed (const PIZNeuralGas *x, long argc, long *argv);
00156 
00157 /**
00158  * \brief   Get the number of learnings currently performed.
00159  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00160  * \return  The number of learnings.
00161  * \ingroup neuralGas
00162  */
00163 long pizNeuralGasCount (const PIZNeuralGas *x);
